episodes.title: First Blood
episodes.plot: The women of H Block return to Wentworth after the fire to find a new dynamic in play - Vera is now governor, Will is deputy and Kaz Proctor has established a power base, and 'The Freak' returns to Wentworth.

episodes.title: Poking Spiders
episodes.plot: Ferguson launches a campaign to be released into the general prison population regardless of her peril and Kaz organises for the inmates to protest for conjugal visits.

episodes.title: Prisoner
episodes.plot: Against Vera's wishes, Ferguson is released into general population. The women are out for blood but Vera confines Ferguson to her cell for safety reasons. As always, Ferguson has an end game but will she live to accomplish it?

episodes.title: Screw Lover
episodes.plot: Ferguson strengthens her alliance with Kaz by painting Will as an abuser and Bea as a 'screw-lover', while Maxine receives a devastating diagnosis.

episodes.title: Love and Hate
episodes.plot: With Bea in the slot, Ferguson seeks to strengthen her hold over Kaz by manipulating acting top dog, Maxine into an act of extreme violence. Bea and Allie bond while in neighbouring slots.

episodes.title: Divide and Conquer
episodes.plot: When a young Koori inmate Tasha is subjected to 'prison justice' for pushing the panic button, Doreen shocks everyone by turning her back on Bea.

episodes.title: Panic Button
episodes.plot: Bea holds a vote among the inmates to determine if there should be a top dog in the prison. Ferguson finds out that there is a surprise witness for Jesper.

episodes.title: Plan Bea
episodes.plot: A clandestine affair heats up, but neither party knows their every move is being watched. Maxine undergoes a procedure away from the prison.

episodes.title: Afterlife
episodes.plot: Bea has trouble recovering after her attack. Ferguson returns from hospital and is immediately placed under supervision in a medical hold.

episodes.title: Smitten
episodes.plot: Bea discovers Allie has fallen back into drug addiction. Franky pursues Shayne in the hope of exposing Ferguson's plan to undermine her trial and secure her release from Wentworth.

episodes.title: Eleventh Hour
episodes.plot: Jake is nervous after a $90k payment is missed, as Bea tries to protect Allie from her decision to lag on Tina as Bea is forced to step down, while Shayne confronts a drug effected Will Jackson at a nightclub.

episodes.title: Seeing Red
episodes.plot: Bea scrambles to get a step ahead of Ferguson, who's scheming as the trial approaches. Maxine continues chemotherapy. Liz believes Sonia is innocent.
